mapper.select: select S_NO,S_ADDR,S_NAME,S_LIMITPRICE,S_PAYOPT,S_TEXT,S_PHONE, S_OPENSTATUS,S_ENROLLSTATUS,S_ORIFOODINFO,S_LOGIMG ,S_TIME,B_NO,S_HOLIDAY,S_COUPON,to_char(S_STARTTIME,'HH24:MI:SS') AS S_STARTTIME, to_char(S_ENDTIME,'HH24:MI:SS') AS S_ENDTIME from store where b_no=#{no}
select ct_name from category join store_category using(ct_no) where s_no =#{no}
select s_img from store_img where s_no =#{no}
